(ENG)

During the 90th century, the latter half is a bunch of young guys interested in technology in an apartment outside Stockholm. A little tentative start to try to get into different computer systems at different agencies and colleges in Sweden. But when they successfully manage to get into one system after another growing urge for the ultimate challenge.

A few months later, they managed to get into NASA and the U.S. Air Force. It struck like a bomb for the government of the United States and soon the hunt is in full swing with the FBI and the National Criminal Investigation Department cybercrime root in Stockholm. This is the story of the case of the Swedish hackers "Fragglarna" that could have ended with prison sentences in the United States for up to 60 years.
